title: What does it mean by $$f g x$$
text: It means evaluate f and g at $$x$$ and multiply the results.
speech: It means evaluate f and g at  x  and multiply the results.
pacedSpeech: It means evaluate f and g at   x

title: Multiply two functions
text: What's $$\left(4x+3\right) \left(2x+5\right)$$? We can FOIL out the expression and get $$8x^2$$ + $$26x$$ + $$15$$ as the final answer.
speech: What's  parentheses, 4 x plus 3,  times, parentheses, 2 x plus 5,  ? We can FOIL out the expression and get  8 x squared,  +  26 x  +  15  as the final answer.
